name: My Blog (Geeky Life)
content: A Pelican-powered static blog, on my thoughts and experiances and events sometimes. Theme is designed and written by myself in pure CSS3 without use of any third-party frameworks.

name: My Personal Website
content: I share my knowledge here with people through a clean, simple design using VueJS, Webpack and CSS Animations. Go check the source code!

name: Subscene API
content: A http wrapper for subscene.com in pure Python 3
